ValidationRule.description: When a product's Sale Price is changed to a lower amount (indicating a discount given), the Discount Reason field must be filled out.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ISCHANGED(UnitPrice), ListPrice > UnitPrice, ISBLANK( Discount_Reason__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide an explanation of the discount given in the Discount Reason field whenever the Sales Price is lower than the List Price.
